snippet: George North should not have been allowed to resume playing for Northampton after suffering a head injury against Leicester, an RFU panel ruled on Wednesday, but no action will be taken against his club....
lead_paragraph: George North should not have been allowed to resume playing for Northampton after suffering a head injury against Leicester, an RFU panel ruled on Wednesday, but no action will be taken against his club.

headline.main: Northampton Escape Sanction Over North Treatment
headline.print_headline: Northampton Escape Sanction Over North Treatment
